title: The intersection at Colege and Oleander is horrible going northbound , if you want to make a left turn about 6 cars can turn left before the light changes.Then you wait forever for the light to change. You may have to wait several light changes to turn. The entire intersection is horrible.  Thanks for your response.  Ron
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/timing-traffic-signal-college-oleander-adjusted/
